internationalizations.title: Web3 Balances Viewer
internationalizations.description:
It's almost the end of the year and a month since our #Web3 Balances Viewer extension release! 😍

We are extremely grateful to everyone who supported us during the development and everyone who tried it. 💘

We are working on upgrading our extension, so here is new update for it: NEW 30 tokens are added for you to check! 🤯

Now it's even easier to find balance you need with our Web3 Balances Viewer. Want to know what are those new tokens added? Go check on hashtag#Google hashtag#Marketplace! 😉 If you are missing token you need or you want to add your custom token to the list - DM us to discuss opportunities! 📧

B-EE Team. 🎅 🤶

internationalizations.title: Web3 Connect
internationalizations.description: 🌐 Web3 Connect: Simplify Your Web3 Experience 🚀 Are you ready to take your web3 interactions to the next level? Introducing Web3 Connect, an open-source Angular library designed to streamline the connection between users and web3 applications.
